comments.body:
Fixes:
```
ERROR: 40:42  expect  Compile error in typescript@3.1 but not in typescript@3.2.
Fix with a comment '// Minimum TypeScript Version: 3.2' just under the header.
Argument of type 'Uint8Array' is not assignable to parameter of type 'ArrayBuffer'.
  Types of property '[Symbol.toStringTag]' are incompatible.
    Type '"UInt8Array"' is not assignable to type '"ArrayBuffer"'.
```
